summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of the alley in block 44, Supplemental Plat of Pontius's 2nd Addition, being the alley from East Republican Street to East Mercer Street, between Belmont Avenue North and Summit Avenue North; by paving and otherwise improving the same in accordance with Majority Petition No. 115501 of the City Council of the Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
